headline: Jim Cramer Notes Circle Internet “Came Out of the IPO Gate Super Hot”
summary: Circle Internet Group (NYSE:CRCL) is one of the 13 stocks Jim Cramer recently shed light on. While discussing crypto-related stocks, Cramer mentioned the company, as he said: “Second group of winners, pretty much anything related to crypto. Now, some are linked to buying and selling crypto. headline: Robinhood Launches Micro Bitcoin, Solana and XRP Futures Contracts
summary: The move expands its existing crypto futures offering to its nearly 26 million funded accounts.

raw.headline: Robinhood Launches Micro Bitcoin, Solana and XRP Futures Contracts
raw.summary: The move expands its existing crypto futures offering to its nearly 26 million funded accounts.

headline: The Smartest Growth Stock to Buy With $500 Right Now
summary: Robinhood is popular among younger investors thanks to its user-friendly platform.  The company is moving beyond reliance on trading activity by introducing features such as retirement accounts and competitive interest rates on uninvested cash to help stabilize its revenue.  Robinhood has seen an increase in funded customers and platform assets, which has contributed to impressive earnings growth.
